modName: Ashara Romantic Outfit for CBBE - UNP - FavoredSoul
summary:
This mod adds a new outfit and boots inspired by the pictures of Victoria Francés, as a standalone item. There are several colours available for the female dress and the male suit.

There is also the option of replacing the wedding outfit and/or the party outfit with one of the Romantic outfit variations
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]
[size=3]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can not use my assets in any mods/files that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[/color][/center]

Name: Ashara's Romantic Outfit
Version: 5.0
Date: 23-03-2012
Category: Clothing
Requirements: None
Author(s): Ashara
Source:
* Nexus: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5577]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5577[/url]
* Steam (only the Standalone mod, with long skirt version and the default corset/vest colours):
** For UNP: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=204164411]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=204164411[/url]
** For CBBE: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=207165783]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=207165783[/url]
* Russian translation by Guchi777: [url=http://modgames.net/load/252-1-0-8660]http://modgames.net/load/252-1-0-8660[/url]

[center]Thanks to MMoxReview for the showcasing video:

[youtube]lqs2lTyP2Uo[/youtube][/center]
[center][size=14][color=yellow]Description
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
This mod adds to Skyrim a new outfit and boots inspired by the pictures of Victoria Francés.
The female dress comes in six different colours, with two textures for the corset: default and tartan, and with two skirt lenghts: long and short. The male suit comes in six different colours for the vest and two textures: default and tartan, and four different colours for the jacket, trousers and boots.
All outfit variations can be bought from a vendor, Victoria, that is at Dragonsreach Throne room, in Whiterun.

Outfits Statistics (Long and Short versions)
--------------------------------------------------
* Slot = Body
* Weight = 1
* Base value = 100
* Armour rating = 0
* Enchantment: Fortify persuasion (+20), Fortify barter (+ 20)

Boots Statistics
------------------
* Slot = Feet
* Weight = 0.5
* Base value = 50
* Armour rating = 0
* Enchantment: Fortify pickpocket (+10), Fortify sneak (+ 10)

There is also the option of replacing the wedding outfit and boots and/or the party outfit and boots with the Romantic outfit. For the replacers versions you have to choose only one of them for each replacer but you can mix different colours and textures for each of the pieces of clothing.

You can also add the outfit and boots to your inventory by using the following console commands:
Wedding outfit:
* dress: player.additem 00088956 1
* boots: player.additem 00088958 1

Party outfit:
* dress: player.additem 000e40de 1
* boots: player.additem 000e40df 1

And there is another version of the mod that replaces the Radiant raiment you are given in Solitude.

The standalone and the replacers versions are completely compatible: you can have all of them installed at the same time.

It can be installed using Nexus Mod Manager (download it here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager/) or manually. For the replacers version, as there are several options to choose from, I strongly recommend that you use Nexus Mod Manager.

The female bodies used for the dress are the default UNP and the default CBBE v2/v3 bodies and the male bodies are the default FavoredSoul bodies. If you use another body mod you may see weird textures in places were the outfits show the skin.

[size=14][color=yellow]Required mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
The female bodies used for the dress are:
* the default UNP bodies ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709[/url]).
* the default CBBE v2/v3 bodies ([url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666[/url]).

Also, Strikegio has made a conversion for the CBBE HDT body, you can find it here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65446/?]Ashara's Romantic outfit CBBEHDT conversion[/url]

The male bodies used for the suit are the default FavoredSoul bodies ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488[/url]).

If you use another body mod you may see weird textures in places were the outfit shows the skin.

[size=14][color=yellow]Install
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
[color=turquoise]STANDALONE VERSION
-----------------------------------------------[/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

Manual install
----------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the AsharaMerchantNPC.esm
.- the AsharaRomanticOutfit.esp
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
3. Open the Skyrim launcher and in "Data files" check the AsharaMerchantNPC.esm and AsharaRomanticOutfit.esp files. Make sure that the esm is loaded before the esp file.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".


[color=turquoise]WEDDING AND PARTY OUTFIT REPLACERS
----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
3. The installer will ask you several options (if it doesn't work, close Nexus Mod Manager, open it again and then activate the mod: it should work fine then):
4. Select the replacer: you can replacer the wedding outfit, the party outfit or both.
For each replacer you have selected:
5. First select how the female dress will look:
5.1 Select the dress type: long skirt or short skirt
5.2 Select the corset texture: default or tartan
5.3 Select the corset colour from the available colours
5.4 Select the skirt colour from the available colours
5.5 Select the boots colours from the available colours
6. Next select how the male suit will look:
6.1 Select the vest texture: default or tartan
6.2 Select the vest colour from the available colours
6.3 Select the jacket colour from the available colours
6.4 Select the trousers colours from the available colours
6.5 Select the boots colours from the available colours

Manual install
-----------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. If you want to install the Wedding dress replacer, check the files inside the "Wedding dress" folder
2.1 Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the AsharaWeddingOutfit.esp file
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
from the "0. Common files" folder
2.2 Select the dress type, long skirt or short skirt and:
.- To install the long skirt dress type, copy the meshes folder that is inside the "1. Long skirt meshes" folder.
.- To install the short skirt dress type, copy the meshes folder that is inside the "2. Short skirt meshes" folder.
2.3 Select the corset textures, default or tartan and a colour:
.- To install the default corset textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "3. Default corset textures" + colour.
.- To install the tartan corset textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "4. Tartan corset textures" + colour.
2.4 Select the colour of the skirt and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "5. Skirt textures" + colour
2.5 Select the colour of the boots and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "6. Boots textures" + colour
2.6 Select the vest textures, default or tartan and a colour:
.- To install the default vest textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "7. Default vest textures" + colour.
.- To install the tartan vest textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "8. Tartan vest textures" + colour.
2.7 Select the colour of the jacket and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "9. Jacket textures" + colour
2.8 Select the colour of the trousers and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "10. Trousers textures" + colour
2.9 Select the colour of the boots and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "11. BootsM textures" + colour
2.10 Open the Skyrim launcher and in "Data files" check the AsharaWeddingOutfit.esp
3. If you want to install the Party dress replacer, check the files inside the "Party dress" folder
3.1 Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the AsharaPartyOutfit.esp file
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
from the "0. Common files" folder
3.2 Select the dress type, long skirt or short skirt and:
.- To install the long skirt dress type, copy the meshes folder that is inside the "1. Long skirt meshes" folder.
.- To install the short skirt dress type, copy the meshes folder that is inside the "2. Short skirt meshes" folder.
3.3 Select the corset textures, default or tartan and a colour:
.- To install the default corset textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "3. Default corset textures" + colour.
.- To install the tartan corset textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "4. Tartan corset textures" + colour.
3.4 Select the colour of the skirt and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "5. Skirt textures" + colour
3.5 Select the colour of the boots and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "6. Boots textures" + colour
3.6 Select the vest textures, default or tartan and a colour:
.- To install the default vest textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "7. Default vest textures" + colour.
.- To install the tartan vest textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "8. Tartan vest textures" + colour.
3.7 Select the colour of the jacket and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "9. Jacket textures" + colour
3.8 Select the colour of the trousers and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "10. Trousers textures" + colour
3.9 Select the colour of the boots and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "11. BootsM textures" + colour
3.10 Open the Skyrim launcher and in "Data files" check the AsharaPartyOutfit.esp
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[color=turquoise]RADIANT RAIMENT REPLACER
--------------------------------------------------[/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
3. The installer will ask you several options (if it doesn't work, close Nexus Mod Manager, open it again and then activate the mod: it should work fine then):
4. First select how the female dress will look:
4.1 Select the dress type: long skirt or short skirt
4.2 Select the corset texture: default or tartan
4.3 Select the corset colour from the available colours
4.4 Select the skirt colour from the available colours
4.5 Select the boots colours from the available colours
5. Next select how the male suit will look:
5.1 Select the vest texture: default or tartan
5.2 Select the vest colour from the available colours
5.3 Select the jacket colour from the available colours
5.4 Select the trousers colours from the available colours
5.5 Select the boots colours from the available colours

Manual install
----------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Check the files inside the "Radiant raiment" folder
2.1 Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the AsharaRadiantRaiment.esp file
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
from the "0. Common files" folder
2.2 Select the dress type, long skirt or short skirt and:
.- To install the long skirt dress type, copy the meshes folder that is inside the "1. Long skirt meshes" folder.
.- To install the short skirt dress type, copy the meshes folder that is inside the "2. Short skirt meshes" folder.
2.3 Select the corset textures, default or tartan and a colour:
.- To install the default corset textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "3. Default corset textures" + colour.
.- To install the tartan corset textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "4. Tartan corset textures" + colour.
2.4 Select the colour of the skirt and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "5. Skirt textures" + colour
2.5 Select the colour of the boots and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "6. Boots textures" + colour
2.6 Select the vest textures, default or tartan and a colour:
.- To install the default vest textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "7. Default vest textures" + colour.
.- To install the tartan vest textures, copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "8. Tartan vest textures" + colour.
2.7 Select the colour of the jacket and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "9. Jacket textures" + colour
2.8 Select the colour of the trousers and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "10. Trousers textures" + colour
2.9 Select the colour of the boots and:
.- copy the textures folder that is inside the folder "11. BootsM textures" + colour
2.10 Open the Skyrim launcher and in "Data files" check the AsharaRadiantRaiment.esp
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[size=14][color=yellow]Uninstall
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
[color=turquoise]STANDALONE VERSION
---------------------------------------------[/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
----------------------
1. Delete:
.- the AsharaMerchantNPC.esm
.- the AsharaRomanticOutfit.esp
.- the folder texturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAsharaMerchantNPC.esm and its contents
.- the folder texturesAsharaRomantic outfitDress and its contents
.- the folder meshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomAsharaMerchantNPC.esm and its contents
.- the folder meshesAsharaRomantic outfitDress and its contents

[color=turquoise]WEDDING AND PARTY OUTFIT REPLACERS
-----------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
---------------------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
--------------------
1. Delete:
.- the folder TexturesAsharaRomantic outfit and its contents
If you have installed the wedding dress replacer:
.- the AsharaWeddingOutfit.esp file
.- the folder meshesClothesWeddingDress and its contents
If you have installed the party dress replacer:
.- the AsharaPartyOutfit.esp file
.- the folder meshesAsharaParty outfit and its contents

[color=turquoise]RADIANT RAIMENT REPLACER
-------------------------------------------------[/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
------------------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
-------------------
1. Delete:
.- the AsharaRadiantRaiment.esp file
.- the folder TexturesAsharaRomantic outfitRadiant raiment and its contents
.- the folder meshesClothesRadiantRaiment and its contents

[size=14][color=yellow]Incompatibility
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
For the standalone version: none that I am aware of.
For the replacers: As it replaces the wedding outfit and/or the party outfit and/or the Radiant raiment clothes it will be incompatible with any other mod that modifies/replaces those outfits. If you find anything else, please tell me.

[size=14][color=yellow]Known issues or bugs
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
The short skirt clips a little when running. You are wellcome to improve its weighting.

There is a bug in the CK that makes that 1st person female models don't show the correct textures if you use texture sets (as is the case of th standalone version of this mod).

If you find anything else, please tell me.

[size=14][color=yellow]Mods used in pictures
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
The characters shown in pictures can be found here as presets:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6075]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6075[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]Related mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* Reaper's [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5864]Ashara Romantic Outfit Retextured[/url]. Adds a new stylish texture to the dress.
* Sergeantik's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12940]Aurora Plus TSO[/url]. Uses the dresses from this mod
* Dheuster's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7247]18 Skimpy Outfits for FTBS[/url]. Adds the corset from this mod as a standalone item.
* messiasmummo's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15855]Ashara Romantic Outfit Royal ReTexture[/url]: Replaces the original textures with much better looking ones.
* Soulslayerzx's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18429]Ashara Romantic Outfit Royal ReTexture[/url]. Adds some new retextures to the female outfits.
* Foaman's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24684]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url]. The standalone versions of these outfits are added to a new merchant, also named Victoria XD
* Rip88's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19866]A Classier BB Luxury Suite[/url]. Some of the outfits added by this mod have been made using the romatic outfit as a basis.
* Rip88's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25237]Summer Wear V2 nsfw[/url]. The vendor's outfit is from this mod.
* Vie101010's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30797]Black Swordsman Armor[/url]. The armour uses the coat from this mod.
* ousnius' [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731/?]Bodyslide CB Plus Plus - Extra Sliders for CBBE and Outfits[/url]. Ousnius has made these clothes compatible with CBBE body slider.
* Rip88's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31742/?]Bri - a sexy companion - NSFW[/url]. Bri, the follower added buy this mod, uses a modified version of the romantic outfit.
* Urshi's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39588/?]Noble Wedding Dress[/url]. It uses the long skirt from this mod.
* saintgrimm92's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45532//?]Forest of Silence - Draculas Castle Player Home And Quest[/url]. It uses the outfits from this mod.
* jacknifelee's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48875/?]Cyrodiil Men Fashion[/url]. A great retexture of the men suits of this mod.
* ShinglesCat's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49178/?]SC - Noble Dresses[/url]- It uses the long skirt from this mod.
* Strikegio's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65446/?]Ashara's Romantic outfit CBBEHDT conversion[/url] - It adapts the female outfits of this mods to CBBE HDT.
* drmwayne's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/25913/?]Gothic Lady Dress - CBBE - BodySlide - AWKCR[/url]. It uses the corset from this mod.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tutorials
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_1]Creating an armour for Skyrim. Part 1[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_2]Creating an armour for Skyrim. Part 2[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Converting_an_armour_to_another_body_for_Skyrim]Converting an armour to another body for Skyrim
[/url]* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=User:SydneyB]Other Tutorials[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]History
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
5.0, 23-01-2015 - Added the beautiful retextures done by Jacknifelee for the male outfit under the optional files section
5.0, 16-04-2012 - Added a replacer for the Radiant raiment.
5.0, 23-03-2012 - Added male suit.
4.0, 25-02-2012 - Version for UNP body.
3.2, 17-02-2012 - fixed clipping of the skirts.
2.2, 07-02-2012 - added a green version of the dresses. Added an esp file: now only the Party dress is replaced by the Romantic Outfit, the Fine clothes 02 are not replaced anymore.
2.1, 21-01-2012 - fixed position of boxes, now they won't go through the ground. Fixed version of the file displayed by Nexus Mod Manager.
2.0, 20-01-2012 - added short skirt meshes for the dress. Made it possible to use different colours and dress type for the wedding dress and the party dress replacers. Packaged everything in one file. Added an installer to allow easier installation of the different options when using Nexus Mod Manager.
1.4, 14-01-2012 - added optional Tartan textures for the corset.
1.4, 13-01-2012 - improved the weights of the corset
1.3, 08-01-2012 - separated the lace and the corset. Hopefully this fixes the transparency issues with lighting for everybody.
1.2, 08-01-2012 - Fixed transparency flags of the corset
1.1, 08-01-2012 - Double sided meshes, modified transparency flags for the corset (it still looks too transparent with ENB, I am still working on fixing this. Any help would be appreciated) and added 1st person meshes.
1.0, 07-01-2012 - Initial release.

[size=14][color=yellow]Contact
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can contact me leaving a comment at the mod's thread, sending me a PM or leaving a comment at the mod's thread.

You can find me on Nexus as SydneyB: http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=259193.
You can find me on the Bethesda official forums as Ashara: http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums/index.php?showuser=364891.
You can find me on Clan Dlan as Ashara: http://www.clandlan.net/foros/index.php?showuser=6932.

[size=14][color=yellow]Credits
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Caliente for the CBBE female body.
Thanks to Dimon for the UNP female body.
Thanks to Chris57 and FavoredSoul for the male body.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on: [url=http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp]http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp[/url]
Thanks to Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to all the modding community for all their tutorials, tools and help. Especially, thanks to the Clan Dlan, Bethesda Official Forum and the Nexus communities.
Thanks to all of you that are using this mod and are helping me to improve it with your suggestions.

==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Blender - http://www.blender.org
GIMP - http://www.gimp.org/
The Compressonator - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11852

Construction Kit (available on Steam)

Readme Generator - http://lhammonds.game-host.org/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

[size=14][color=yellow]Permissions
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can reuse any part of this mod into your own mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.

[size=14][color=yellow]My Skyrim mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
